verses.verse: In the mean time, when there were gathered <WG1996> together <WG1996> an innumerable <WG3461> multitude <WG3461> of people, <WG3793> so <WG5620> that they stepped <WG2662> one <WG240> on another, <WG240> he began <WG756> to say <WG3004> to his disciples <WG3101> first <WG4412> of all, Beware <WG4337> you of the leaven <WG2219> of the Pharisees, <WG5330> which <WG3748> is hypocrisy. <WG5272>
For there is nothing <WG3762> covered, <WG4780> that shall not be revealed; <WG601> neither hid, <WG2927> that shall not be known. <WG1097>

Therefore <WG473> <WG5607> whatever <WG3745> you have spoken <WG2036> in darkness <WG4655> shall be heard <WG191> in the light; <WG5457> and that which <WG3739> you have spoken <WG2980> in the ear <WG3775> in closets <WG5009> shall be proclaimed <WG2784> on the housetops. <WG1430>

And I say <WG3004> to you my friends, <WG5384> Be not afraid <WG5399> of them that kill <WG615> the body, <WG4983> and after <WG3326> that have <WG2192> no <WG3365> <WG5100> more <WG4055> that they can <WG1410> do. <WG4160>

But I will forewarn <WG5263> you whom <WG5101> you shall fear: <WG5399> Fear <WG5399> him, which after <WG3326> he has killed <WG615> has <WG2192> power <WG1849> to cast <WG1685> into <WG1519> hell; <WG1067> yes, <WG3483> I say <WG3004> to you, Fear <WG5399> him.
Are not five <WG4002> sparrows <WG4765> sold <WG4453> for two <WG1417> farthings, <WG787> and not one <WG1520> of them is forgotten <WG1950> before <WG1799> God? <WG2316>

But even <WG2532> the very <WG2532> hairs <WG2359> of your <WG5216> head <WG2776> are all <WG3956> numbered. <WG705> Fear <WG5399> not therefore: <WG3767> you are of more <WG1308> value <WG1308> than many <WG4183> sparrows. <WG4765>

Also <WG1161> I say <WG3004> to you, Whoever <WG3956> shall confess <WG3670> me before <WG1715> men, <WG444> him shall the Son <WG5207> of man <WG444> also <WG2532> confess <WG3670> before <WG1715> the angels <WG32> of God: <WG2316>
But he that denies <WG720> me before <WG1799> men <WG444> shall be denied <WG533> before <WG1799> the angels <WG32> of God. <WG2316>

And whoever <WG3956> <WG3739> shall speak <WG2046> a word <WG3056> against <WG1519> the Son <WG5207> of man, <WG444> it shall be forgiven <WG863> him: but to him that blasphemes <WG987> against <WG1519> the Holy <WG40> Ghost <WG4151> it shall not be forgiven. <WG863>

And when <WG3752> they bring <WG4374> you to the synagogues, <WG4864> and to magistrates, <WG746> and powers, <WG1849> take you no <WG3361> thought <WG3309> how <WG4459> or <WG2228> what <WG5101> thing you shall answer, <WG626> or <WG2228> what <WG5101> you shall say: <WG2036>
For the Holy <WG40> Ghost <WG4151> shall teach <WG1321> you in the same <WG846> hour <WG5610> what <WG3739> you ought <WG1163> to say. <WG2036>
And one <WG5100> of the company <WG3793> said <WG2036> to him, Master, <WG1320> speak <WG2036> to my brother, <WG80> that he divide <WG3307> the inheritance <WG2817> with me.
And he said <WG2036> to him, Man, <WG444> who <WG5101> made <WG2525> me a judge <WG1348> or <WG2228> a divider <WG3312> over <WG1909> you?

And he said <WG2036> to them, Take heed, <WG3708> and beware <WG5442> of covetousness: <WG4124> for a man's <WG5100> life <WG2222> consists <WG2076> not in the abundance <WG4052> of the things which he possesses. <WG5224>
And he spoke <WG2036> a parable <WG3850> to them, saying, <WG3004> The ground <WG5561> of a certain <WG5100> rich <WG4145> man <WG444> brought <WG2164> forth <WG2164> plentifully: <WG2164>

And he thought <WG1260> within <WG1722> himself, <WG1438> saying, <WG3004> What <WG5101> shall I do, <WG4160> because <WG3754> I have <WG2192> no <WG3756> room where <WG4226> to bestow <WG4863> my fruits? <WG2590>

And he said, <WG2036> This <WG5124> will I do: <WG4160> I will pull <WG2507> down <WG2507> my barns, <WG596> and build <WG3618> greater; <WG3187> and there <WG1563> will I bestow <WG4863> all <WG3956> my fruits <WG1081> and my goods. <WG18>

And I will say <WG2046> to my soul, <WG5590> Soul, <WG5590> you have <WG2192> much <WG4183> goods <WG18> laid <WG2749> up for many <WG4183> years; <WG2094> take your ease, <WG373> eat, <WG5315> drink, <WG4095> and be merry. <WG2165>

But God <WG2316> said <WG2036> to him, You fool, <WG878> this <WG5026> night <WG3571> your soul <WG5590> shall be required <WG523> of you: then <WG1161> whose <WG5101> shall those things be, which <WG3739> you have provided? <WG2090>
So <WG3779> is he that lays up treasure <WG2343> for himself, <WG1438> and is not rich <WG4147> toward <WG1519> God. <WG2316>

And he said <WG2036> to his disciples, <WG3101> Therefore <WG1223> <WG5124> I say <WG3004> to you, Take no <WG3361> thought <WG3309> for your <WG5216> life, <WG5590> what <WG5101> you shall eat; <WG5315> neither <WG3366> for the body, <WG4983> what <WG5101> you shall put <WG1746> on. <WG1746>
The life <WG5590> is more <WG4119> than meat, <WG5160> and the body <WG4983> is more than raiment. <WG1742>

Consider <WG2657> the ravens: <WG2876> for they neither <WG3756> sow <WG4687> nor <WG3761> reap; <WG2325> which <WG3739> neither <WG3756> have <WG2076> storehouse <WG5009> nor <WG3761> barn; <WG596> and God <WG2316> feeds <WG5142> them: how <WG4214> much <WG4214> more <WG3123> are you better <WG1308> than the fowls? <WG4071>
And which <WG5101> of you with taking thought <WG3309> can <WG1410> add <WG4369> to his stature <WG2244> one <WG1520> cubit? <WG4083>
If <WG1487> you then <WG3767> be not able <WG1410> to do that thing which is least, <WG1646> why <WG5101> take you thought <WG3309> for the rest? <WG3062>

Consider <WG2657> the lilies <WG2918> how <WG4459> they grow: <WG837> they toil <WG2872> not, they spin <WG3514> not; and yet I say <WG3004> to you, that Solomon <WG4672> in all <WG3956> his glory <WG1391> was not arrayed <WG4016> like <WG5613> one <WG1520> of these. <WG5130>

If <WG1487> then <WG1161> God <WG2316> so <WG3779> clothe <WG294> the grass, <WG5528> which is to day <WG4594> in the field, <WG68> and to morrow <WG839> is cast <WG906> into <WG1519> the oven; <WG2823> how <WG4214> much <WG4214> more <WG3123> will he clothe you, O you of little <WG3640> faith? <WG3640>
And seek <WG2212> not you what <WG5101> you shall eat, <WG5315> or <WG2228> what <WG5101> you shall drink, <WG4095> neither <WG3361> be you of doubtful <WG3349> mind.

For all <WG3956> these <WG5023> things do the nations <WG1484> of the world <WG2889> seek <WG1934> after: <WG1934> and your <WG5216> Father <WG3962> knows <WG1492> that you have need <WG5535> of these <WG5130> things.
But rather <WG4133> seek <WG2212> you the kingdom <WG932> of God; <WG2316> and all <WG3956> these <WG5023> things shall be added <WG4369> to you.
Fear <WG5399> not, little <WG3398> flock; <WG4168> for it is your <WG5216> Father's <WG3962> good pleasure <WG2106> to give <WG1325> you the kingdom. <WG932>

Sell <WG4453> that you have, <WG5224> and give <WG1325> alms; <WG1654> provide <WG4160> yourselves <WG1438> bags <WG905> which wax <WG3822> not old, <WG3822> a treasure <WG2344> in the heavens <WG3772> that fails <WG413> not, where <WG3699> no <WG3756> thief <WG2812> approaches, <WG1448> neither <WG3761> moth <WG4597> corrupts. <WG1311>
For where <WG3699> your <WG5216> treasure <WG2344> is, there <WG1563> will your <WG5216> heart <WG2588> be also. <WG2532>
Let your <WG5216> loins <WG3751> be girded <WG4024> about, <WG4024> and your <WG3588> lights <WG3088> burning; <WG2545>

And you yourselves like <WG3664> to men <WG444> that wait <WG4327> for their lord, <WG2962> when <WG4218> he will return <WG360> from the wedding; <WG1062> that when he comes <WG2064> and knocks, <WG2925> they may open <WG455> to him immediately. <WG2112>

Blessed <WG3107> are those <WG1565> servants, <WG1401> whom <WG3739> the lord <WG2962> when he comes <WG2064> shall find <WG2147> watching: <WG1127> truly <WG281> I say <WG3004> to you, that he shall gird <WG4024> himself, and make <WG347> them to sit <WG347> down <WG347> to meat, and will come <WG3928> forth <WG3928> and serve <WG1247> them.

And if <WG1437> he shall come <WG2064> in the second <WG1208> watch, <WG5438> or <WG2532> come <WG2064> in the third <WG5154> watch, <WG5438> and find <WG2147> them so, <WG3779> blessed <WG3107> are those <WG1565> servants. <WG1401>

And this <WG5124> know, <WG1097> that if <WG1487> the manager <WG3611> of the house <WG3617> had known <WG1492> what <WG4169> hour <WG5610> the thief <WG2812> would come, <WG2064> he would have watched, <WG1127> and not have suffered <WG863> his house <WG3624> to be broken <WG1358> through. <WG1358>
Be you therefore <WG3767> ready <WG2092> also: <WG2532> for the Son <WG5207> of man <WG444> comes <WG2064> at an hour <WG5610> when you think <WG1380> not.
Then <WG1161> Peter <WG4074> said <WG2036> to him, Lord, <WG2962> speak <WG3004> you this <WG5026> parable <WG3850> to us, or <WG2228> even <WG2532> to all? <WG3956>

And the Lord <WG2962> said, <WG2036> Who <WG5101> then <WG686> is that faithful <WG4103> and wise <WG5429> steward, <WG3623> whom <WG3739> his lord <WG2962> shall make <WG2525> ruler <WG2525> over <WG1909> his household, <WG2322> to give <WG1325> them their portion <WG4620> of meat <WG4620> in due season? <WG2540>
Blessed <WG3107> is that servant, <WG1401> whom <WG3739> his lord <WG2962> when he comes <WG2064> shall find <WG2147> so <WG3779> doing. <WG4160>
Of a truth <WG230> I say <WG3004> to you, that he will make <WG2525> him ruler <WG2525> over <WG1909> all <WG3956> that he has. <WG5224>

But and if <WG1437> that servant <WG1401> say <WG2036> in his heart, <WG2588> My lord <WG2962> delays <WG5549> his coming; <WG2064> and shall begin <WG756> to beat <WG5180> the menservants <WG3816> and maidens, <WG3814> and to eat <WG2068> and drink, <WG4095> and to be drunken; <WG3182>

The lord <WG2962> of that servant <WG1401> will come <WG2240> in a day <WG2250> when he looks <WG4328> not for him, and at <WG1722> an hour <WG5610> when he is not aware, <WG1097> and will cut <WG1371> him in sunder, and will appoint <WG5087> him his portion <WG3313> with the unbelievers. <WG571>

And that servant, <WG1401> which <WG3588> knew <WG1097> his lord's <WG2962> will, <WG2307> and prepared <WG2090> not himself, neither <WG3366> did <WG4160> according <WG4314> to his will, <WG2307> shall be beaten <WG1194> with many <WG4183> stripes.

But he that knew <WG1097> not, and did commit <WG4160> things worthy <WG514> of stripes, <WG4127> shall be beaten <WG1194> with few <WG3641> stripes. <WG4127> For to whomsoever <WG3956> <WG3739> much <WG4183> is given, <WG1325> of him shall be much <WG4183> required: <WG2212> and to whom <WG3739> men have committed <WG3908> much, <WG4183> of him they will ask <WG154> the more. <WG4055>
I am come <WG2064> to send <WG906> fire <WG4442> on <WG1519> the earth; <WG1093> and what <WG5101> will <WG2309> I, if <WG1487> it be already <WG2235> kindled? <WG381>
But I have <WG2192> a baptism <WG908> to be baptized <WG907> with; and how <WG4459> am I straitened <WG4912> till <WG2193> it be accomplished! <WG5055>
Suppose <WG1380> you that I am come <WG3854> to give <WG1325> peace <WG1515> on <WG1722> earth? <WG1093> I tell <WG3004> you, No; <WG3780> but rather <WG2228> division: <WG1267>
For from now on <WG3568> there shall be five <WG4002> in one <WG1520> house <WG3624> divided, <WG1266> three <WG5140> against <WG1909> two, <WG1417> and two <WG1417> against <WG1909> three. <WG5140>

The father <WG3962> shall be divided <WG1266> against <WG1909> the son, <WG5207> and the son <WG5207> against <WG1909> the father; <WG3962> the mother <WG3384> against <WG1909> the daughter, <WG2364> and the daughter <WG2364> against <WG1909> the mother; <WG3384> the mother <WG3994> in law <WG3994> against <WG1909> her daughter <WG3565> in law, <WG3565> and the daughter <WG3565> in law <WG3565> against <WG1909> her mother <WG3994> in law. <WG3994>

And he said <WG3004> also <WG2532> to the people, <WG3793> When <WG3752> you see <WG1492> a cloud <WG3507> rise <WG393> out of the west, <WG1424> straightway <WG2112> you say, <WG3004> There comes <WG2064> a shower; <WG3655> and so <WG3779> it is.
And when <WG3753> you see the south <WG3558> wind blow, <WG4154> you say, <WG3004> There will be heat; <WG2742> and it comes <WG1096> to pass.
You hypocrites, <WG5273> you can <WG1492> discern <WG1381> the face <WG4383> of the sky <WG3772> and of the earth; <WG1093> but how <WG4459> is it that you do not discern this <WG5126> time? <WG2540>
Yes, and why <WG5101> even <WG2532> of yourselves <WG1438> judge <WG2919> you not what <WG3588> is right? <WG1342>

When <WG5613> you go <WG5217> with your <WG4675> adversary <WG476> to the magistrate, <WG758> as you are in the way, <WG3598> give <WG1325> diligence <WG2039> that you may be delivered <WG525> from him; lest <WG3379> he hale <WG2694> you to the judge, <WG2923> and the judge <WG2923> deliver <WG3860> you to the officer, <WG4233> and the officer <WG4233> cast <WG906> you into <WG1519> prison. <WG5438>
I tell <WG3004> you, you shall not depart <WG1831> there, <WG1564> till <WG2193> you have paid <WG591> the very last <WG2078> mite. <WG3016>
